originalText.text: Emilio and I scheduled two workshops for my team at Jacobi Hospital (Stand up to Violence Program). He connected so well with our team, and they enjoyed every minute. He made the team feel so comfortable in speaking in front of everyone through his techniques and guidelines. We will definitely be utilizing his workshops again in the near future. Thank you, Emilio!

text.text: Emilio and I scheduled two workshops for my team at Jacobi Hospital (Stand up to Violence Program). He connected so well with our team, and they enjoyed every minute. He made the team feel so comfortable in speaking in front of everyone through his techniques and guidelines. We will definitely be utilizing his workshops again in the near future. Thank you, Emilio!

originalText.text: Speak from Within isn't your average public speaking training service. Emilio does a great job of not only teaching you the technical skills needed to speak effectively (e.g. eliminating filler words, body language, etc.) but how to tap into your unique perspective and overall authenticity to instill a genuine and meaningful connection with your audience. I can even apply what I learned to my interpersonal relationships. You will be able to practice what you learn on the spot and receive live feedback. He also does a great job of engaging the room and creating camaraderie amongst trainees. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text:
Working 1:1 with Emilio has been one of the best investments that I’ve made in my career. Before I started a new job at a PR agency, I knew that I needed to speak up during meetings and be able to effectively communicate my thoughts and ideas. Emilio's expertise in storytelling, listening, and helping me to understand the root of where my fear of public speaking came from, is incredible.

After class, Emilio shares his feedback and key takeaways. It’s a great way to reflect back and acknowledge which areas you still need to work on. Emilio has helped me perfect my elevator pitch, presentation techniques (body language, facial expression, hand gestures, etc.), and learn techniques to reframe my anxiety into excitement.

If you struggle with public speaking, know that you're not alone and there are coaches like Emilio that can help. I’m so glad that I found the Speak From Within website and I took a leap of faith and booked my coaching sessions with Emilio. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: This was my first time taking a 1:1 presentation skills class and I had zero clue what to expect. I was looking for a class for enhance my communication skills for work - specifically confidence while presenting.  Emilio was very professional, asked great questions, and helped me source the root of my problems within just one session. I was very pleasantly surprised with his guidance on how to enhance my public speaking/confidence. If you’re considering this, I HIGHLY recommend!

originalText.text: Coming into this workshop I was terrified because I was facing my own fears of speaking in group settings.  Emilio instantly made me feel that I was in a safe environment and I was able to open up and show my true authenticity.  One of my favorite things of the class was his delivery of constructive criticism.   Emilio was able to be gentle enough to nourish my growth without destroying my confidence which is a very difficult thing to accomplish with me.  I would strongly recommend to go to any of his workshops so you are able to experience what I did !
